name: Svastia Genetics, Inc
description: Developer of a clinical-genomic platform intended to improve people's lives through precision medicines. The company's platform provides multi-omic analytics workflows and access to novel clinical genomic data to accelerate biomarker discovery and validation, enabling doctors to select the right therapy for patients or refer them to the right clinical trials using their genetic profiles.
one_liner: Developer of a clinical-genomic platform intended to improve people's lives through precision medicines. The company's platform provides multi-omic analytics workflows and access to novel clinical genomic data to accelerate biomarker discovery and validation, enabling doctors to select the right therapy for patients or refer them to the right clinical trials using their genetic profiles.
